name: QR
summary: Simple QR helpers with fluent and static APIs.
remarks: Use to pick the output format by file extension.

methods.name: Create
methods.summary: Starts a fluent QR builder for plain text.

methods.name: Create
methods.summary: Starts a fluent QR builder for a payload with embedded defaults.

methods.name: Save
